help-file.title: "VAMPIRIC TOUCH"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <self> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
This spell temporarily transforms the person's hands into magical lifeforce leeches. If in battle and unarmed, your hands will suck away your opponent's life force, granting some of it to you.
This can also be an innate ability.
